text: Arthrosaura reticulata, the yellowbelly arthrosaura, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is found in Ecuador, Brazil, Venezuela, Guyana, Colombia, Peru, and Bolivia. ==References== Category:Arthrosaura Category:Reptiles described in 1881 Category:Taxa named by Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy
title: Arthrosaura reticulata
